andromeda.why: Healthy withdrawal preserves sovereignty; refuse domination at the door.

arcturus.why: Set a clear threshold/door policy—container-first regulation.

draco.why: Threshold vigilance: who gets access and under what terms.

orion-dark.why: If fear-led, the boundary hardens into rules and compliance tests.

orion-light.why: Courage to hold the line without aggression.

pleiades.why: Calm presence de-escalates and settles nervous systems.

sirius.why: Private boundary practice, not formal transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Find workable terms and pacing—adjust the container for contact.

orion-dark.why: Compromise may slide into appeasing doctrine or authority.

orion-light.why: Integrity under pressure—speak truth gently but firmly.

pleiades.why: Diplomatic soothing and attunement reduce charge.

sirius.why: Relational tuning, not codified protocol yet.

andromeda.why: Swinging between appeasement and pushback outsources agency.

arcturus.why: Inconsistent boundaries create choppy regulation and containment.

orion-dark.why: Rules get weaponized to force compliance.

orion-light.why: Hard lessons in conflict forge principled courage.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing blurs the boundary and fuels volatility.

sirius.why: No stable teaching signal—this is trial-and-error learning.

andromeda.why: Protects both parties’ sovereignty via fair terms.

arcturus.why: Sets mediation structure and pacing—clean container for dialogue.

draco.why: Triangulation or status blocks can creep into the process.

orion-dark.why: Leans on policy to control rather than resolve.

pleiades.why: Hosts a safe, attuned space so contact can happen.

sirius.why: Teaches de-escalation by protocol and example.

andromeda.why: Arbitrates to prevent domination and restore consent.

arcturus.why: Clarifies terms, roles, and cadence—container excellence.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to agreed boundaries and accords.

orion-dark.why: Settlement can calcify into doctrine or coercion.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity under pressure to reach honorable peace.

pleiades.why: Keeps the field soothed and bonded through resolution.

sirius.why: Royal arbitration signal—teaches boundary law and process.

andromeda.why: Embodied sovereignty chooses only right conflict.

arcturus.why: Sets standing boundary norms for the whole field.

draco.why: Presence can read as status barrier or intimidation.

orion-dark.why: Principle risks law-over-life or excommunication patterns.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage—chooses peace or battle by principle.

pleiades.why: Focus is boundary law, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Teaching-by-presence: a living protocol for boundaries and peace.
